say: Welcome to Clockify Tracker! To use the Clockify skill, you need to enter your API key. I just sent a card to your Alexa app, click on it. You'll be redirected to a browser so that you can enter your API key. You can find it by going to the Settings menu of the Clockify website. See you soon!
What project would you like to log to? You need to start with the project is: like, the project is internal tasks, or the project is time off
You have already logged your lunch time, come back next week.
I just logged all your lunch hours for the week. Anything else?
What is the project's name? You need to start with the project is: like, the project is internal tasks, or the project is time off
What is the task's name? You need to start with the task is: like, the task is internal meetings, or the task is company training, or the task is independent study
What's the description for your task? You need to start with description is, like: description is: studying AWS
I didn't find a project called {projectName}. Can you try again?
I didn't find a task called {taskName}. Can you try again?
How much time are you logging for this task?
Ok, just to confirm. I'm going to create the following task: You lasted {duration} in: {description}, for the task {taskName}, in the project {projectName}. Is this correct?
Ok, I just logged this task. Anything else?
